Log in with the username and password password that you used to sign up with insuranceLine
Password and Confirmation does not match
The email/phone you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
If you decline out T&C\'s you are not able to progress into the insuranceline Fitbit app

*Please see Terms and Conditions section for full details.
Complete your first goal and you will unlock the second reward. A New Balance Voucher worth $30*
Complete your second goal and you will unlock the third reward. A New Balance Voucher worth $50*
Complete 100.000 steps and you will be eligible to redeem a Village Cinema Movie Voucher worth $20*
Complete 200.000 steps and you will be eligible to redeem a New Balance Voucher worth $30*
Complete 500.000 steps and you will be eligible to redeem a Healt Voucher worth $50*
When you connect Fitbit to our app. Your Fitbit activities will automatically show up.\n\nAny activity will automatically contribute to your Fitbit all day stats like calories and active minutes.
There is no data to display. Go to Goal > Start the goal and turn back this page again.
There is no data to display. Go to More > Manage Fitbit Permissions and check the permissions.
You have completed your first goal of 100.000 steps.
You have won two Village Movie Tickets!
Please provide the email address which you would like the reward to be sent to:
Your reward has been sent to your email.
Boost Period (Minute): if user can not achieve the goal in this amount of time, notification fires end of this time
Reminder Period (Minute): Notification is fired in every Reminder period.
Campaign End: Set any mintes. Campaign is going to be end in thise amunt of time
Target: Set the first target of goal. (Ex: 100 steps) algorith will calcualte the next goal
